function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective social distancing measures in the workplace","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among employees","Mitigation":"Implement clear social distancing guidelines and use technology for monitoring compliance","Technologies":"IoT sensors for monitoring occupancy, digital signage for guidance","People":"Employees, visitors","Owner":"Management, facility staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate workplace health and safety monitoring","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread and employee illness","Mitigation":"Regular health and safety inspections, provision of personal protective equipment (PPE)","Technologies":"Health monitoring apps, contactless access control systems","People":"Employees, visitors","Owner":"Health and safety team, management"},{"Description":"Insufficient support for remote working employees","Impact":"Decreased productivity and employee morale, potential feelings of isolation","Mitigation":"Provide necessary equipment, establish clear communication channels, and offer mental health support services","Technologies":"Telecommuting software, virtual collaboration tools","People":"Remote working employees","Owner":"HR department, IT department"}]}
